header.description: Full Stack Developer passionate about building amazing web applications.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with a passion for creating and developing web applications. I have experience in both front-end and back-end technologies, and I am always looking to learn new things. I am a team player and I enjoy working with others to achieve a common goal. I am currently looking for new opportunities to grow and develop my skills.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on. Click on the project to see more details.

contact.heading: Contact Me
contact.description: Feel free to reach out via the form below. I look forward to connecting with you!
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully!

experience.title: Experience

footer.text: Thank you for visiting my portfolio. Feel free to explore more of my projects and connect with me on social media!
